g.text: [User does not already have a session (or 'prompt' includes 'login')]
[User consent may be skipped if already given unless 'prompt' includes 'consent')]
"Do you want to login on ClientFoo? Information requested: â€¦"
"amr": [â€¦], (OPTIONAL, list of user authentication methods used),
"azp": "CID-XXXX",n "sid": "SID-XXX", (OPTIONAL, different for different RPs, for Front/Back-Channel Logout)
"at_hash": "â€¦" (included when response_type="id_token token", half of the hash of the access_token)
and its association with the user session
Check code against at_hash (protect against access_token substitution attacks)
